firstName.IS_STRING: your first name must be a string entry
firstName.IS_NOT_EMPTY: you must enter your first name in order to register.

lastName.IS_STRING: your last name must be a string entry.
lastName.IS_NOT_EMPTY: your last name is required to register.

email.IS_STRING: the e-mail must be a string entry.
email.IS_NOT_EMPTY: to validate your data, your email address is required.
email.IS_EMAIL: the e-mail entered is not a valid entry.

password.IS_STRING: your password must be a string entry.
password.IS_NOT_EMPTY: your password can not be empty.
password.MIN: the password must be at least 8 characters long
